DOC.brief_summary: 24 child ( 12 African-American , Hispanic , American Indian , 12 Caucasian ) previously diagnose type 1 diabetes mellitus participate pilot study evaluate presence hepatic peripheral insulin resistance . The investigator use pilot information test hypothesis insulin resistance occur child type 1 DM , secondary underlying risk factor , responsible increase insulin need . Methods include `` step-up '' hyperinsulinemic euglycemic clamp infusion stable isotope 6,6- [ 2H2 ] -glucose . Patient parent interview conduct gather information nutritional intake , ethnicity , family history , socioeconomic status . The investigator also measure inflammatory cytokine free fatty acid determine whether associated difference insulin resistance among type 1 diabetes mellitus patient .
